Articles.Content: The 2 meter advanced SAS module looked great and as if it could actually preform its function before 0.21 when they turned it into reaction wheels, and yet it still looks like a ring with struts and a few computer components inside, despite its new identity. I suggest remodeling that part so it look like it has room to contain reaction wheels, because the current 2 Meter ASAS looks like there is just a few computer components.

I too don't like how it looks like an empty ring, especially when I have to mount something of smaller diameter to it. The least they could do is to extend that small wheel on one side over the whole area so you can't see through it.
